doc.after: There are a number of community activities, including a community website, knowlewest.co.uk,[36] showing the latest events and news in the area. A community newsletter called The Knowledge is produced by Community In Partnership (CIP),[37] facilitated by the Knowle West Media Centre.[38] The Knowle West Future planning forum was established in 2013 to work on a regeneration plan, based on the positive attributes of the estate.[39]
